name: Car Rush
description:
A formula based game with a lot of fun! You are racing against your friends in 1 vs 1 or racing against the time. Can you get the best time? There will be a mode added that you can race against AI/Bots. Watch out for the barriers and race through different race tracks!

What's included in this game:

  • Two race tracks; Zandvoort & Valencia
  • Menu's: Home, 1VS1, Time Trial and Race Track selector
  • Animations
  • Car sounds
  • Background music
